statements: SELECT * FROM genomic_data
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM genomic_data WHERE age > 40
SELECT genetic_sequence, gender FROM genomic_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer'
SELECT diagnosis, age FROM genomic_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY diagnosis DESC
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM genomic_data WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 50
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM genomic_data WHERE age BETWEEN 40 AND 60
SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(genetic_sequence) AS sequence_count FROM genomic_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(genetic_sequence) >= 2
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 18;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'FEMALE';
SELECT patient_name, dna_sequence FROM patients JOIN genomic_data ON patients.patient_id = genomic_data.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, data_type FROM patients LEFT JOIN genomic_data ON patients.patient_id = genomic_data.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, dna_sequence FROM genomic_data WHERE data_type = 'RNA' ORDER BY data_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients INNER JOIN genomic_data ON patients.patient_id = genomic_data.patient_id WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_name, age, dna_sequence FROM patients JOIN genomic_data ON patients.patient_id = genomic_data.patient_id WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM GenomicData;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM GenomicData ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage > '100mg';
SELECT result_id, patient_id, research_date FROM ResearchResults WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, conclusion FROM GenomicData JOIN ResearchResults ON GenomicData.patient_id = ResearchResults.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM GenomicData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, dna_sequence FROM GenomicData WHERE dna_sequence LIKE '%ACGT%';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM GenomicData JOIN Medications ON GenomicData.patient_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT patient_name, research_date, conclusion FROM GenomicData JOIN ResearchResults ON GenomicData.patient_id = ResearchResults.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM GenomicData ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM Genes;
SELECT * FROM Samples WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, variant_type FROM Patients JOIN Variants ON Patients.patient_id = Variants.gene_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, collection_date FROM Patients JOIN Samples ON Patients.patient_id = Samples.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, gene_name, pathogenicity FROM Patients JOIN Samples ON Patients.patient_id = Samples.patient_id JOIN Variants ON Samples.sample_id = Variants.variant_id WHERE pathogenicity = 'pathogenic';
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, start_position, end_position FROM Gene WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT sample_id, sample_type, collection_date FROM Sample WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM Researcher ORDER BY researcher_name;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM Patient;
SELECT * FROM Sample WHERE sample_type='Blood';
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, start_position, end_position FROM Gene WHERE chromosome='X';
SELECT mutation_type, position FROM Mutation WHERE mutation_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM Researcher ORDER BY specialization DESC;
